import*as React from'react';import canUseDom from"../Dom/canUseDom";/**
 * Wrap `React.useLayoutEffect` which will not throw warning message in test env
 */var useInternalLayoutEffect=process.env.NODE_ENV!=='test'&&canUseDom()?React.useLayoutEffect:React.useEffect;var useLayoutEffect=function useLayoutEffect(callback,deps){var firstMountRef=React.useRef(true);useInternalLayoutEffect(function(){return callback(firstMountRef.current);},deps);// We tell react that first mount has passed
useInternalLayoutEffect(function(){firstMountRef.current=false;return function(){firstMountRef.current=true;};},[]);};export var useLayoutUpdateEffect=function useLayoutUpdateEffect(callback,deps){useLayoutEffect(function(firstMount){if(!firstMount){return callback();}},deps);};export default useLayoutEffect;
